text: We collect (and control) the information of users who want to schedule events via Cronofy, and process the information of their end-users with whom they're scheduling the event.
Our Company uses cookies in a range of ways to improve your experience on our website, including:

Privacy Notice

Annex #

To provide information about your calendar to third party service providers with whom you already have a pre-existing relationship and have given your consent for them to process your personal data.

data_type: personal datum of contact include in use of platform
text:
In using our Platform, we may also collect personal data of your contacts and other third parties that are included in your use of the Platform.
We process this personal data only to provide you with the services that you have requested.

Privacy Notice

Annex #

To share your personal data with our partners (detailed below).
We will disclose your personal data only to third party service providers whom you already have an existing relationship with (such as your calendar provider).
We may disclose personal data to our professional advisors when seeking advice.

For example, we store the personal data you provide on computer systems with limited access that are located in facilities to which access is limited.
In accordance with data protection laws, we will only process personal data where we have a lawful basis for doing so.
We may also need to disclose personal data in the event of a reorganisation, sale, or takeover.
We may disclose personal data to our professional advisors when seeking advice.
We will disclose your personal data only to third party service providers whom you already have an existing relationship with (such as your calendar provider).
We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required by law.
You have the following rights in relation to your personal data: a right to object to processing where the lawful basis is that it is in our legitimate interests, but please note that we may still process your personal data where there are other relevant lawful bases or where we have compelling grounds to continue processing your personal data in our interests which are not overridden by your rights, interests or freedoms;
